datafield.subfield: Muḥammad Khudayr-- [et al.] ; dirāsat Fāḍil Thāmir, Yāsīn al-Naṣīr.

Thāmir, Fāḍil, al-Naṣīr, Yāsīn. Hādhihi al-majmūʻah al-qaṣaṣīyah-- limādhā? -- al-Naṣīr, Yāsīn. Naẓrah ʻalá wāqiʻ al-qiṣṣah al-qaṣīrah fī al-ʻIrāq. -- Thāmir, Fāḍil. ʻAlāmāt fī ṭarīq taṭawwur al-qiṣṣah al-ʻIrāqīyah. -- Khudayr, Muḥammad. al-Urjūḥah. -- al-Asadī, Fahd. -- Ṭuyūr al-samāʾ. -- Karīdī, Mūsá. Ṭuqūs al-ʻāʾilah. -- ʻAbd al-Amīr, Khudayr. -- Waraqat al-iḥtijāj al-ʻāshirah. -- al-ʻIbādī, Ghazī. li-ʻAḍāʾ. -- al-Dabbāgh, Ghānim. al-Ṣūrah. -- Khalaf, Aḥmad. Nuzhah fī shawāriʻ mahjūrah. -- Nāṣir, ʻAbd al-Sittār. Rajul ismuhu Sharīf Nādir. -- al-Rabīʻī, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān. al-Dāʾirah lā bāb laha. -- al-Lāmī, Jumʻah. Ihtimāmāt ʻIrāqīyah. -- al-Qayyisī, Jalīl. -- Dayyūs akas māshīnā. -- Būluṣ, Sirkūn. al-Maljāʾ. -- ʻĀrif, Muḥammad Kāmil. al-Ṭayr al-aswad al-ṣaghīr. -- Khiḍr, Mawfiq. Ḥikāyatān ʻan al-madīnah. -- ʻAbd al-Majīd, Muḥammad. al-Hijrah fī al-ayyām al-muʾajjalah min zaman al-sakhaṭ. -- al-Ḥaydarī, Yūsuf. al-ʻAnkubūt.
